task.title: Viewing messaging users by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can view messaging users by using the user list command on the command line.

taskbody.context: You can view messaging users by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to view messaging users, see .The commands must be capitalized as shown.

step.cmd: To view a list of all the messaging users, enter the following command:
To view a specific messaging user, enter the following command:
step.info:
user list "UserID=UserID" "Type=Messaging"Where:
UserID Specifies the user ID of the user that you want to view.

taskbody.example: The following example shows viewing a list of messaging users: user list "Type=Messaging" UserID:admin UserID:TEST Group Membership: newTestGroup UserID:TEST2
